By checking this box and logging in you agree to out privacy policy.

CommonDungeon is a community of nerds where we primarily play D&D 5e using an augmented West Marches style.\nThe setting is the colorful world of Mistra and our characters are part of the powerful Bright Dawn adventuring guild.

The usual way people join is when they know someone in the server and that someone makes an application for those new people.\nBut you can write to common.dungeon@gmail.com if you are interested and we\'ll see what we can do.
